steps.sql: SELECT id FROM materials WHERE name = 'Silk';
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID for the material with the name "Silk"

steps.sql: SELECT sewing_task_id FROM sewing_material_allocation WHERE warehouse_material_id IN (SELECT id FROM warehouse_material WHERE material_id = '5');
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing task IDs that use the material "Silk"

steps.sql: SELECT st.id, st.start_time, st.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name, op.product_id, op.number FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN working_group wg ON st.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id WHERE st.id IN (11, 12, 13, 14);
steps.description: Retrieve the details of sewing tasks that use the material "Silk"

response:

| 12             | March 27, 2024      | April 12, 2024      | Master Sewers      | 29         | 150    |
| 13             | March 27, 2024      | April 6, 2024       | Master Sewers      | 13         | 130    |
| 14             | March 18, 2024      | April 8, 2024       | Master Sewers      | 5          | 120    |
